file_content.text: I am Captain Evlen, commanding officer of the Tyrant. You are Darth Tormen's bounty hunter?
Darth Tormen instructed me to rendezvous with the Tyrant here.
That's correct.
Good. Pay attention, we don't have much time.
What's with the blaster fire in the background?
Who's shooting?
We've been boarded. The situation is bad.
I don't answer to Tormen, or you.
I'm not "his" anything.
Then consider this an urgent request.
Republic special forces slipped on board during our troop withdrawal. They've completely overrun the command decks.
It won't be long before we lose the bridge. If you act quickly, we might be able to turn things around.
What do you need me to do, Captain?
How can I help?
Darth Tormen can't handle this himself?
What about the Sith Lord?
He went to deal with the attackers personally, but his soldiers are sealed off from the bulk of the fighting.
I won't do it for free.
You'll get whatever I can give you, but not if we lose this ship!
The boarders initiated a complete lockdown, trapping our defenders in the sub-decks. I need you to undo their tampering.
With their overrides disabled, we can unseal the locked decks from the bridge, so Darth Tormen and his soldiers can retake control.
Give me the where and how.
What's the plan?
You're in good hands.
If I didn't believe that, I wouldn't have asked.
This'll be a cakewalk.
The boarders are not your primary concern. No unnecessary risks.
I'm transmitting the location of the ship's network junctions; restore the systems and we can handle the rest.
I've opened the docking bays and disabled our weapons, you can make a safe landing if you hurry. The window of opportunity is--
Now or never.
If we're going to land, we'd better do it before the boarders get the turbolasers back online.
We're in for a rough landing.
Strap in.
Business as usual then.
Figures I'd have a big lunch.
The Imperials aren't gonna save themselves.
Guess we should help.
Never do.
Can't wait to rub this rescue in Tormen's face.
The Sith won't live this down.
If you're gonna rub his face in somethin', make it the dirt.
Please don't....
